fields.name: Daily Gem Income
fields.value:
(level 6001~8000)
` 500` <:aowgem:847363788592119838> - For completing headhunts.
` 390` <:aowgem:847363788592119838> - For completing daily challenges.
`1200` <:aowgem:847363788592119838> - For being active with idle chest.
` 250` <:aowgem:847363788592119838> - If you have a VIP subscription.

fields.name: Tips
fields.value: Gems are best used for hero shards in events (card master, wheel) and Temple of Fusion! Save temple for endgame though. It can get expensive.

footer.text: Use `{PREFIX}info gem-purchase`, `{PREFIX}info idle-rewards`, `{PREFIX}info gem-battles` for related information.
